publicationStmt.publisher: The Characters that shaped the Silk Road - A Database and Digital Paleography of Tarim

msItem.title: Dialogue between the Buddha and Maudgalyāna

history.provenance: found in Qizil Miŋ-Öyduring T III MQ 17.4

seg.seg: ... sie machen gleichsam Musik [und] bringen deinen Ohren Lust.
.... they make music, as it were, [and] bring your ears pleasure.
Ich Gemeiner fand Gefallen an den Sinneslüsten.
I, a lowly one, found joy in the sensual pleasures.
... you don't fear the evil road. 5 ...

list.item: a1 /// ññi pyapyaicci wawakā[ṣ] po kom[p]aino ayato eśnai_s_añ\ mruntsañ ka a2 /// _ś_a[rka] ram_t(\) ya_m_askeṃ _t_añä(\) klautsnai_s_añ _k_allaskeñ-cä(\) _s_akwä ke a3 /// ppālntasa tseññana kmu_t_antas ārkwina se tekai yo_k_a _ra a4 /// k[a] _ṣ_ap wärñi lwasā =neṅkā cäñcre ya_m_askeṃ wektse we_k(\) kreñcepi yā a5 /// ññä ·e ente twe ya_m_aṣatai kreṃt yāmo_r\ orocce cmelane _m_akc[p]i yā a6 /// [k]·rcyeṃ m[ā] teṃ yekte _ṣ_armo _t_añä(\) mā rano snai _ṣ_arm seṃ tot oko nemce[k ·ai] a7 /// ñña aṣanīkentse mudgulyāyani ce prā_ś_ś_aṃ pe_p_arkoṣ [_p_a] – – – a8 /// [p]·_p_arkormeṃ yamor kren_t_a _m_akc[p]i okonta wär_p_anoyt_r_a _t_aṅ – – – b1 /// s· aṣanīkeṃt_s\ 1 leki saṃtke wäs[t_s_a]nma wsāwa ñäś ā – – – b2 /// ts yällau yuko_ṣ_aṃt_s\ kekeso_ṣ_aṃt_s\ tā_k_arṣkeṃ [ñ]äś _p_alsko[n]· – – b3 /// wa as_t_are [pa]nnak rano _ś_ak śtwerne _ś_ak piśne po añmsa wawla[w]· b4 //// [cm]etsiś[c]o kāwo tumeṃ tāka 3 cpi kreñcepi yāmorntse _ṣ_armtsa b5 /// [·(·)w·]ññe ainake ñäś yamṣamai wina iśelmeṃne tu pos_t_aṃ b6 /// ·s· k· l[o] lmorntse mā twe [p]rāskat takāsta twe yaitkusa wrocce[p]i rṣā b7 /// ñä(\) yolyai imaimeṃ prosko ne[_s_a]ṃ 5 boddhyaṅgänta indrinta b8 /// ś cwi twe tumeṃ tse[ta]_r\ [s]nai _ṣ_m_a[r]e [r]am_t – [kt]e co_k(\) kekesorne ma_k_a
b7 ... you don't fear the evil road. 5 ...
Dialogue between the Buddha and Maudgalyāna

a1 /// #M21_21_18_13# ññi pyapyaicci ; wawākaṣ|wawakāṣ po kompaino ; ayāto|ayato eśnaisäñ #Xb mruntsañ ka a2 /// śarka|śärka ramt yamaskeṃ|yamäskeṃ tañ|täñ klautsnaisäñ källāskeñ-c|källaskeñ-c sakw|säkwä ke- a3 /// ; (u)ppālntasa tseññana ; kmutäntas arkwina|ārkwina se ; tekai yok_(color)|yokä #Xc ra a4 /// ka ṣäp ; warññi|wärñi lwāsa|lwasā eneṅka|=neṅkā #Xa cäñcare|cäñcre yamaskeṃ|yamäskeṃ wektse ; wek kreñcepi yā- a5 /// ññä ·e ; ente twe yamaṣatai|yamäṣatai ; krent|kreṃt yāmor orocce #Xx cmelane mäkcwi|mäkcpi yā- a6 /// kercciyeṃ|k(e)rcyeṃ mā teṃ yäkte|yekte ṣarm|ṣärmo tañ|täñ mā rano snai ṣarm|ṣärm seṃ tot oko nemcek ·ai a7 /// ñña aṣanīkentse mudgulyāyani ce prāśśäṃ peparkoṣ|pepärkoṣ pä – – – a8 /// #M18# peparkormeṃ|p(e)pärkormeṃ yāmor|yamor ; krenta|krentä mäkcwi|mäkcpi okonta ; wärpänoyträ #1b täṅ – – – b1 /// s· aṣanīkeṃts 1 #1d leki sāṃtke|saṃtke wästsanma|wästsänma ; wsāwa ñäś ā – – – b2 /// ts yälloṃ|yällau yukoṣäṃts ; kekesoṣäṃts #2c takarṣkeṃ|tākärṣkeṃ ñäś palskone|pälskon(e) ; – – b3 /// wa #3a astare|astäre pannāk|pannak rano ; śak|śäk śtwerne śak|śäk piśne po ; āñmtsa|añmsa wawlāwau|wawlaw(au) b4 //// cmetsiśc|cmetsiśco kāwo ; tumeṃ tāka 3 #3d cwi|cpi kreñcepi yāmorntse ; ṣarmtsa|ṣärmtsa b5 /// ·(·)w·ññe ainake ñäś yāmṣamai|yamṣamai wīna|wina yśelmeṃne|iśelmeṃne tu postäṃ b6 /// ·s· k·lo lmorntse ; mā twe prāskat_(Prs.)|prāskat #4a takāsta twe yaitkusa ; oroccepi|wroccepi rṣā b7 /// ; (mā ta)ñ yolyiyai|yolyai ymaimeṃ|imaimeṃ ; prosko nesäṃ_(Sg.)|nesäṃ 5 #5d boddhyaṅgänta indrinta ; b8 /// ś cwi twe tumeṃ tsetar ; snai ṣmare|ṣmäre ramt (mä)kte cok ; kekesorne #6c makä

Translations from [[Peyrot, ToSu]]
Lines Translation Pages
b6 Don't you be afraid! 308

Translations from [[Schmidt KT 1974]]
Lines Translation Pages
a2 ... sie machen gleichsam Musik [und] bringen deinen Ohren Lust. 390
b5 Ich Gemeiner fand Gefallen an den Sinneslüsten. 343

Transcription and translation from [[Meunier 2013]]: 171:
b5 (cmelne l)w(ā)ññe ainake ñäś yamṣamai wina iśelmeṃne "Dans l'existence animale, commune, j'ai trouvé du plaisir aux jouissances sexuelles." –Martin (Fri, 2015-07-10, 18:47:33 (CEST))

div.p:
Alternative classifications:

Transcription and translation from <citedRange>171</citedRange></bibl>: <ref type="ms" target="__b5"/> <hi>(cmelne l)w(ā)ññe ainake ñäś yamṣamai wina iśelmeṃne</hi> "Dans l'existence animale, commune, j'ai trouvé du plaisir aux jouissances sexuelles." –Martin (Fri, 2015-07-10, 18:47:33 (CEST))</p></project_comment>
